comments: Extremely genuine and helpful professor... always available for EI and gives great review packets for exams. Very smart, maybe too smart for teaching, but will try his best to explain something in a manner that you can understand. Highly recommended!

Good Prof. Had him the 1st semester 2009. Lectures are easy to follow, just pay attention and be respectful. Doesn\'t check homeworks, but does have quizes, but only after he gives the class a day to ask questions on the material, then the questions are right off the assignment list. Very accessible and helpful in E.I.
Very funny in class, great to learn from if you are good at math.
I have had this guy for 2 days and I all ready know he is really smart but too smart to teach kids. Going to be a rough semester for me since I will have to teach myself!

Where to begin, Altner\'s teaching style is impossible to learn from, he just started teaching this school year. He is not helpful at all and his lectures are confusing and not consistent with the text. Depressing...

Whole class disagrees with how altner runs class, but he\'s not open to discussion or change.Does everythng "by the book". Cant teach. He is very smart, but CANNOT share his knowledge.Appearance=SHAMEFUL. Gets dressed **** in the dark each morning. Born without ability to interact socially. Perfect for engineering or math job, NEVER teaching.
